name: SHUNGHAM
goal:
SHUNGHAM monitors EU policy and provides corresponding information services to national, regional, and local governments; other public bodies; private-sector companies; industry associations; NGOs; and academic institutes.

SHUNGHAM does not represent interests nor seek to exert influence on EU policy nor on any of the Institutions of the EU - neither for its own purposes nor on behalf of any client.

SHUNGHAM also does not collect specific information for any specific client. EU Issue Tracker is a subscription-based information service with a large and diverse number of customers, each of whom has access to the same set of information.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: We cover most or all policy areas except Medical & Pharma, Public Health and Social Affairs.
